publisher.publisher-name: Minda de Gunzburg Center for European Studies at Harvard University

title-group.article-title: Play It Again, Sartre ? New Dreyfusards in Search of a New Dreyfus

Vingtième Siècle, July-September 1994:

"Political correctness en version originale, et en version française." Two texts prolong this effort: "Good to Think: The American Reference in French Discourses of Immigration and Ethnicity," in Multicultural Questions,
Christian Joppke and Steven Lukes, eds., (New York: Oxford U.P., forthcoming); and "The Purloined Gender: American Feminism in the French Mirror," French Historical Studies (forth- coming).
